purpose: The email invites submissions for the International Symposium on Sustainable Systems Technologies and Green Computing (STGC) scheduled for October 15-17, 2025, in Dubrovnik, Croatia. It encourages original research papers, case studies, and industry insights on topics related to sustainable and energy-efficient software systems. The symposium is co-located with the 3rd International Conference on Federated Learning Technologies and Applications (FLTA 2025). Accepted papers will be published in IEEE Xplore. Key dates include a submission deadline of August 2, 2025, and the symposium date.
